Key Match Events: Ottneil Baartman took a wicket with his very first ball and conceded just nine runs from his four overs
Anrich Nortje posted extraordinary figures of 4/7 from 4 overs
Quinton de Kock anchored the chase with 20 from 27 balls
Heinrich Klaasen (19* from 22) and David Miller (6* from 6) completed the job with 3.4 overs and six wickets to spare
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa beat Sri Lanka with a total of 78 runs
Sri Lanka won the toss and elected to bat first
Nuwan Thushara and Dasun Shanaka made the powerplay breakthroughs
Wanindu Hasaranga removed De Kock and Tristan Stubbs (13 from 28)
Sri Lanka posted just 77 in 19.1 overs
Kagiso Rabada took 2/21, while Baartman ended with an excellent economy of 2.25 in his four overs
Kusal Mendis, Kamindu Mendis and Angelo Mathews were the only batters to reach double figures
